turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Water.
turn.1: What groups are involved in the protection of water?
turn.2: Organizations concerned with water protection include the International Water Association (IWA), WaterAid, Water 1st, and the American Water Resources Association.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The International Water Management Institute undertakes projects with the aim of using effective water management to reduce poverty.
turn.5: What are some water related conventions?
turn.6: Water related conventions are United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD), International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea and Ramsar Convention.
turn.7: When was the World Day for Water?
turn.8: World Day for Water takes place on 22 March and World Ocean Day on 8 June.
turn.9: What do the different religions view water as?
turn.10: Water is considered a purifier in most religions.
turn.11: Do all religions use water for ablution?
turn.12: Faiths that incorporate ritual washing (ablution) include Christianity, Hinduism, Islam, Judaism, the Rastafari movement, Shinto, Taoism, and Wicca.
